name: feed_by_username
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_1.
Tool description: Collect instagram data with no headaches - more APIs are available, please request any that are not yet available!
API description: Fetches the current Instagram feed for a given username.

username.description: The Instagram username for which to fetch the feed.

raw.description: If set to True or '1', returns the raw, unprocessed data feed. Defaults to None.
